participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, always looking for new challenges and experiences.
participant_1.background: my favorite activity is rock climbing. i'm a mechanical engineer. i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and supportive, she enjoys spending time with her family and has a passion for coaching.
participant_2.background: i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i coach little league baseball. i have five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage.

content.text: I also have a daughter and like coffee too
